summary: UNEXPECTED AND  RANDOM     LOSS OF POWER --- HAVE TO RESTART TO GAIN POWER       OCCURRED 7 TIMES ON 6/27/17 ON A 45 MILE ROUND TRIP   ERRORS ON SCREEN    HAPPENED TWO TIME ON 6/28 ON 4 MILE ROUND TRIP    HAPPENED ONCE IN EARLY MAY WHICH I TOLD THE FORD SERVICE PERSON     SEVERE SAFETY ISSUE   STOPPING MID TRAFFIC  REAR END COLLISION    I HAD TO STOP IN THE MIDDLE OF THE LANE AND TURN IT OFF  PUT IN PARK THEN START AGAIN TO GET GOING AGAIN     "SERVICE ADVANCETRAC"    "HILL ASSIST MODE NOT AVAILABLE"  "SEE MANUAL"   WRENCY SYMBOL
